name: NecroKing
description:
Welcome to the realm of the NecroKing! The king has lived here for numerous years after taking over the kingdom. However, the church has come back to reclaim their land. Summon loyal companions back from the grave to fight off the holy expedition! Controls (Rebindable keys) PausePNext dialogLeft ClickSummonLeft ClickMoveWASD or ⬆️⬇️⬅️➡️ Credits
